description: Data was generated based on running Picard over ~67,000 TCGA bam files in Google Cloud Storage in August 2016.

fields.description: The total number of reads in the input file
fields.name: TotalReads

fields.description: The number of reads that are PF - pass filter
fields.name: PFReads

fields.description: The average read length of all the reads (will be fixed for a lane)
fields.name: ReadLength

fields.description: The total number of bases in all reads
fields.name: TotalBases

fields.description: The total number of bases in all PF reads
fields.name: PFBases

fields.description: The number of bases in all reads that achieve quality score 20 or higher
fields.name: Q20_Bases

fields.description: The number of bases in PF reads that achieve quality score 20 or higher
fields.name: PF_Q20_Bases

fields.description: The number of bases in all reads that achieve quality score 30 or higher
fields.name: Q30_Bases

fields.description: The number of bases in PF reads that achieve quality score 30 or higher
fields.name: PF_Q30_Bases

fields.description: The sum of quality scores of all bases in PF reads divided by 20
fields.name: Q20_EquivalentYield

fields.description: The sum of quality scores of all bases in PF reads divided by 20
fields.name: PF_Q20_EquivalentYield

fields.description: Experimental strategy used to generate library e.g. WGS, WXS
fields.name: library_type
